unnormalised: Hey, loved reading about Mithali Raj! Such an inspiration for young girls in India. I remember watching "Chak De! India" and feeling that same fire. Knowing she comes from a place like Jodhpur makes it even more special. Any chance we'll see a bio of someone from IIT Madras next? More power to her & Indian sports!
